divs: Sighting Detailswe where driving down a road and me and my dad saw a blue light hovering then it droped down faster then gravity could push a thing then as it was droping it started to look like a boomarang. Two days later, we were editing pictures and we saw a ufo in almost every night photo. So i had a thought and started looking at my video camara and saw the ufo boomaranging like me and my dad saw two days ago.......a have the wosrt creepy shivers now........ When the blue light was hovering, than we it took off it turned Green The video footage and the digital camera photographs show the blue lights, we are drilling an oil well in Utah. This is the same area where there were cattle mutilations years ago. Also one of the oil field workers had disappeared from the well location, there were no tracks from his truck, no footprints etc. He just vanished from our well site.
Summary: a circle droped down like a boomarang then disseperd i have video and camara fotteg of them...
